Name: FantasyKingdom：Fantasy Tiny Forest
About the game: Game story background Alien planets also have life and their own worlds, but they are still primitive animal tribes. Human beings cannot understand the civilization between animals, without alien humans to disturb them, nor can they disturb their world. Several strange girls traveled across their planet from unknown places, disturbing the civilized world of these small animals. This game product is a semi-finished game work of personal independent game, and the game operation is divided into two parts: survival mode and Musou mode. Survival mode: avoid the pursuit of monsters, and reach the end, complete the game clearance, defeat the monsters in the way, maze-like game levels, explore the map to find the end. Musou Mode: Unparalleled mowing gameplay, a large wave of monsters attack, quickly defeat them, find the Boss and defeat it, and complete the game clearance.
